Above, the woods have the look of something pushed back, held, waiting to drop down and overwhelm the skylit clearings. Up there the deer will be watching, slithering through the birches. The fields in cultivation stay near to home, asway with a~dpift of cattle, or nodding with corn. Alongside the house, close, lie the strict vegetable rows, and a twisted orchard^struggles^ behind the barn.L^I^ vJvsjl |pver a wall is a smaller field with the one certain harvest, perhaps a dozen grey-white headstones, where the graves are, \\lhk ","docTitle":"","docDate":"2014-07-01 09:46:53.910"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01 09:46:53.691","submitterCode":"57b17a53-6e34-87b0-20ff-a419896f49c9","signature":"digestalg-1|/sTeYSsYDDpnebjFw7IYQ9UILsI=|jzF9O74/RtP4wGl5XhFpOcr7sRUJSuqfolbsg6Sk6QZlUBLUS0C78g==","language":"English"}},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/946a071c-d7c8-389d-b82a-ace7fc4dfd19/cat/1":{"_typeGroup":"topics","category":"http://d.opencalais.com/cat/Calais/Hospitality_Recreation","classifierName":"Calais","categoryName":"Hospitality_Recreation","score":0.773},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/946a071c-d7c8-389d-b82a-ace7fc4dfd19/cat/2":{"_typeGroup":"topics","category":"http://d.opencalais.com/cat/Calais/Environment","classifierName":"Calais","categoryName":"Environment","score":0.712},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/946a071c-d7c8-389d-b82a-ace7fc4dfd19/lid/DefaultLangId":{"_typeGroup":"language","language":"http://d.opencalais.com/lid/DefaultLangId/English"}}
